00130             function                get_rating_object( $MasterId = false , $MasterType = 'user' )
00131             {
00132                   try
00133                   {
00134                         list( $MasterId , $MasterType ) = $this->Link->trasform_master_parameters( $MasterId , $MasterType );
00135                         
00136                         if( $this->Link->dependent_objects_exist( $MasterId , $MasterType , 'rating' ) )
00137                         {
00138                               $Records = $this->Link->get_dependent_objects( 
00139                                     $MasterId , $MasterType , 'rating' , $this->RatingAccess
00140                               );
00141                         }
00142                         else
00143                         {
00144                               $id = $this->RatingAccess->create( 
00145                                     array( 'master_id' => $MasterId , 'master_type' => $MasterType )
00146                               );
00147                               $Records = $this->RatingAccess->select_list( $id );
00148                         }
00149                         
00150                         return( $Records[ 0 ] );
00151                   }
00152                   catch( Exception $e )
00153                   {
00154                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00155                   }
00156             }

00224             function                set_rating( $Value , $MasterId = false , $MasterType = 'user' )
00225             {
00226                   try
00227                   {
00228                         $Value = $this->Security->get( $Value , 'float' );
00229                         
00230                         /* just create rating record in the DB in case is does not exist */
00231                         $Record = $this->get_rating_object( $MasterId , $MasterType );
00232                         
00233                         $this->RatingAcces->update( get_field( $Rating , 'id' ) , array( 'value' => $Value ) );
00234                   }
00235                   catch( Exception $e )
00236                   {
00237                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00238                   }

00267             function                change_rating( $Delta , $MasterId = false , $MasterType = 'user' )
00268             {
00269                   try
00270                   {
00271                         $this->Database->lock( array( 'umx_rating' ) , array( 'WRITE' ) );
00272                         
00273                         $Delta = $this->Security->get( $Delta , 'float' );
00274                         
00275                         /* just create rating record in the DB in case is does not exist */
00276                         $Record = $this->get_rating_object( $MasterId , $MasterType );
00277                         
00278                         $Value = get_field( $Record , 'value' );
00279                         
00280                         $this->RatingAcces->update( get_field( $Rating , 'id' ) , array( 'value' => $Value + $Delta ) );
00281                         
00282                         $this->Database->unlock();
00283                   }
00284                   catch( Exception $e )
00285                   {
00286                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00287                   }
